Package com.gui.ehealt_v2

Class SceneController

java.lang.Object
com.gui.ehealt_v2.SceneController
public class SceneController extends Object
Class allows to control scene switches easy from other controller. Scenes can be switched by an ActionEvent or by pressing a button
Author:
Viktor Benini; StudentID: 1298976
